abilities.name: Heartsbane Toxin
info: The Evil Queen's Heavy Attack can hit and Push Back all enemies in a wide arc in front of her. The Evil Queen has a 20% chance on Basic Attacks and a 40% chance on Heavy Attacks to inflict her target with Poison, dealing 10% damage per second, for 10 seconds. (Max Stacks: 10)
When the Evil Queen inflicts a target with Poison, they are also inflicted with a Heartsbane Charge increasing the strength of all Poison damage, from all sources, by 10% each. (Max Stacks: 10)
The Evil Queen's Basic Attacks deal 50% less damage.

abilities.name: Heartsbane Harvest
info: Each enemy is inflicted with Poison, dealing 10% damage per second, for 10 seconds. (Max Stacks: 10)
All allies Heal 1% each second for 4 seconds. Each Heartsbane Charge on the enemy team adds 0.5% to this value. (Max Stacks: 10)

abilities.name: Vial Of Living Death
info: If an enemy is defeated while inflicted with 1 or more Heartsbane Charges, all enemies have a 100% chance to be inflicted with 1 Heartsbane Charge.
As long as The Evil Queen is above 50% HP, her Heavy Attack inflicts Poison, dealing 10% damage per second, for 10 seconds. (Max Stacks: 10)

talents.name: Elixir of Constitution
talents.info: Grants +20% Health at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Bellowing Dram
talents.info: Grants +20% Attack at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Liquid Weakness
talents.info: While an enemy is inflicted with Poison and 2 or more Heartsbane Charges, they are inflicted with a -20% Attack Debuff.

talents.name: Repellant Draught
talents.info: While an enemy is inflicted with Poison and 3 or more Heartsbane Charges, they are inflicted with a -30% Defense Debuff.

talents.name: Phial of Failure
talents.info: While an enemy is inflicted with Poison and 5 or more Heartsbane Charges, they are inflicted with a -50% Dizzy Debuff.

talents.name: Hopeless Cordial
talents.info: If an enemy is defeated while inflicted with Poison and 8 or more Heartsbane Charges, all allies are Healed for 5% instantly.
